channel.title: Extension Methods on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Extension Methods on Mark Needham

item.title: C#: Extension methods != Open classes
item.description: When I first heard about extension methods in C# it sounded like a pretty cool idea but I wasn’t sure how they differed to the idea of open classes that I had seen when doing a bit of Ruby. After a bit of a struggle recently to try and override some extension methods on HtmlHelper in ASP.NET MVC it’s clear to me that we don’t quite have the same power that open classes would provide.
